question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: De ce este Kota Bogor, Indonezia, cunoscut drept "Orașul ploii"?
answer: Kota Bogor, Indonezia, este cunoscut drept "Orașul ploii" datorită frecvenței mari și intensității precipitațiilor pe parcursul anului.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor, Indonesia, is known as the 'City of Rain' due to the high frequency and intensity of rainfall throughout the year.
